message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand your offer of $90, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for it. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $92. It's a great price, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make a concession. I can offer it to you for $90. It's the best price I can do, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
